name: spotify-lyrics
description: Shows lyrics from the song you're currently playing in Spotify.
author: Yichuan Shen

scripts.build: electron-packager ./ spotifylyrics --app-version=0.1.0 --build-version=0.1.0 --electron-version=1.6.1 --out=./bin --overwrite --app-copyright="Copyright (C) 2016/2017 Yichuan Shen" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Yichuan Shen" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Spotify Lyrics" --win32metadata.OriginalFilename="spotifylyrics.exe" --win32metadata.ProductName="Spotify Lyrics" --win32metadata.InternalName="spotifylyrics.exe" --icon=./icon.ico --asar
